title.narrative: Number of repairs done by RC construction teams which contributed to a safer home
Number of HH received a BOQ from the technical officer
Number of HH received a BOQ from the technical officer and picked-up the materials
Number of monitoring/evaluation visits done by technical officers during and at end of construction
Number of people (individual beneficiary plus people accompanied) who attendended the repair workshop as listed per attendance list
Number of HH finished the repairs on the house following RC guidelines with materials provided from RC and contributed to a safer home
Number of builders who signed a contract for participation of the RC construction team
